participant_1.background:
I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
i wonder about what life in space would be like.
I got rejected from my dream job after putting all my heart and soul into the application process.
I went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.
my neighbor comes over all the time to watch rugby with me.

participant_2.background:
I remember pretending to be a dragon trainer with my siblings at the park and getting lost in our imagination.
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.
my hobby creating houses out of matches.
I've seen a blue whale while on a boat tour in Alaska.
my favorite food is shrimp.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just getting ready to watch some rugby with my neighbor.
Oh, that sounds like fun! I've never seen rugby before, but I've heard it's a great sport.
It is! It's a lot like football, but it's played with a different ball and there are more players on each team.
That sounds interesting. I might have to check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun to watch.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a wedding planner.
Oh, that's cool! I've never met a wedding planner before.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be stressful too.
I bet! I can imagine it's a lot of work to plan a wedding.
It is, but it's also really rewarding to see a couple's dream wedding come to life.
That's awesome. I'm sure you're really good at your job.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what's your favorite part about being a wedding planner?
I love getting to know my couples and helping them create the perfect wedding day for them.
That sounds really special.
It is! It's one of the best parts of my job.
So, what's the weirdest thing you've ever seen at a wedding?
There are a lot of weird things that can happen at weddings, but one of the weirdest things I've ever seen was a couple having a sword fight during their first dance.
Wow, that's definitely weird!
Yeah, it was pretty strange.
What happened after that?
They just kept dancing, like nothing had happened.
That's hilarious!
It was definitely one of the more memorable weddings I've ever planned.
I bet!
